description: schema for a qcodes config file

default_fmt.description: default location formatter used for the legacy dataset

register_magic.description: Register QCoDeS magic when in IPython. Can be set to True, False, or a list of magic commands to be registered

import_legacy_api.description: Import the legacy api in main qcodes namespace

logger.description: controls all settings related to the logging module `qcodes.utils.logger`.

start_logging_on_import.description: whether to call `start_all_logging` on qcodes import time. Valid values are 'always', 'never', 'if_telemetry_set_up'.

console_level.description: control logging level of console output

file_level.description: control logging level of file output.

subscription.description: Controls how subscriptions to the dataset, for e.g. live plotting, are handled. Here subscribers can be registered so that they will be available through `DataSet.subscribe_from_config`. Additionally default subscribers for every DataSet that is generated by the `Measurement` object can be defined.

subscribers.description: List of available pre-configured subscribers. The names of the subscriber entries are available as arguments of the `DataSet.subscribe_from_config` method and can be used in this conifg in the `subscription.default_subscribers` property.

factory_kwargs.description: kwargs that get passed to the factory when creating a new subscriber.

subscription_kwargs.description: kwargs with which subscribe will be called.

default_subscribers.description: List of default subscribers as defined in 'subscription.subscribers'. All subscribers in the list will be added to any DataSet created by the `Measurement.run()` call.

plotlib.description: Plotting library set to null to run without plotting

pyqtmaxplots.description: Maximum number of PyQtPlots to automatically keep in memory

rasterize_threshold.description: Scatter plots and heatmaps with more than this number of points will have their data rasterized by default when saved in vector format

auto_color_scale.description: Control of a auto color scale, that scales such that potential outliers of the data will not be included in the min/max range.

cutoff_percentile.description: Upper and lower percentage of datapoints that may maximally be discarded by the auto color scale. For example for [1,1] the auto color scale will in a set of 10 0000 points not clip more than the 100 points of lowest and highest value.

color_over.description: Matplotlib color representing the datapoints clipped by the upper limit

color_under.description: Matplotlib color representing the datapoints clipped by the lower limit

scriptfolder.description: Location of scripts for general experiments

user.description: Optional feature for qdev-wrappers package: controls user settings of qcodes

enable_forced_reconnect.description: If set to true, on instantiation of an existing instrument from station configuration, the existing instrument instance will be closed.

default_folder.description: Default folder where to look for a YAML station configuration file

default_file.description: Default file name, specifying a YAML station configuration file to load, when none is specified. The path can be absolute, relative to the current folder or relative to the default folder as specified in the qcodes config.

use_monitor.description: Update the monitor based on the monitor attribute specified in the instruments section of the station config yaml file.

GUID_components.description: Identifiers for creating a GUID per run in the dataset database.

write_in_background.description: Should the data be written from a background thread

write_period.description: How often should data be written to disk (s)

use_threads.description: Should instruments be addresesed in parallel for process_params_meas() in doNd measurement

dond_plot.description: Should dond functions automatically open a plot after the measurement completes

dond_show_progress.description: Should dond functions show a progress bar during the measurement

export_automatic.description: Should the data be exported automatically when a measurement is completed? If this is set 'export_type' must be set to a non null value.

export_type.description: Data export type for exporting datasets to disk after a measurement finishes. Does not export if set to null (default). Currently supported type(s): netcdf, csv

export_path.description: Data export path for exporting datasets to disk after a measurement finishes. Only activated if export_type is set

export_prefix.description: Prefix to add to filename for exporting datasets to disk after a measurement finishes. Only activated if export_type is set

export_name_elements.description: Elements to use in export file name, elements are dataset properties. Names will be formatted like '{export_prefix}_{export_name_elements[0]}_{...}.file_extension}' respecting the order of the elements

dataset.description: Settings related to the DataSet and Measurement Context manager

enabled.description: Whether or not to enable sending telemetry data to the developers of QCoDeS (or elsewhere)

instrumentation_key.description: A valid Azure Application Insights instrumentation key
